name: social-manager-by-priyanshu
description: AI-Powered Social Media Management Platform by Priyanshu Suryawanshi

scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ../mobile && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client && npm run test:mobile
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:client && npm run lint:mobile
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:server && npm run lint:fix:client && npm run lint:fix:mobile
scripts.clean: npm run clean:node_modules && npm run clean:build
scripts.clean:node_modules: rm -rf node_modules && cd server && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../client && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../mobile && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.clean:build: cd client && rm -rf build && cd ../mobile && rm -rf dist
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && npm run deploy:staging:server && npm run deploy:staging:client
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build && npm run deploy:production:server && npm run deploy:production:client
scripts.docs: npm run docs:generate && npm run docs:serve
scripts.e2e: npm run e2e:setup && npm run e2e:test
scripts.monitoring: npm run monitoring:server && npm run monitoring:client
scripts.security:audit: npm audit && cd server && npm audit && cd ../client && npm audit && cd ../mobile && npm audit
scripts.security:fix: npm audit fix && cd server && npm audit fix && cd ../client && npm audit fix && cd ../mobile && npm audit fix
scripts.performance:analyze: npm run performance:analyze:client && npm run performance:analyze:mobile
scripts.health: npm run health:server && npm run health:client
